name: Manabaz
description:
Minimalist Arena Brawler

Each side has a warrior and an archer. Kill your enemies to win.

Intelligent Bots

Bots are using neural networks. They are trained with Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO).

Features

  • Local-Multiplayer up to 4 players
  • Can also play alone with a bot teammate
  • Play with keyboard/mouse
  • Or play with a controller
